website_summaries.verdict: This memory loss clock offers an efficient design and a clear display for confusion-free use.
pros: Displays the time, day of the week, month, and year in a bold, easy to read font
Comes with an optional day cycle feature
Can be wall mounted or placed on a flat surface
Offers multiple alarm options for daily reminders
cons: The power cord is awkwardly positioned
Some users felt the evening dimming feature is somewhat limited

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a week then the screen became all fuzzy tried to contact the manufacturer with only being left on hold and no help. Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Works for a friend with Alzheimer's
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a friend with Alzheimer's and ishe likes it and depends on it to keep her straight on daily activities and appointments. I wouldn't mind having one myself. So far it has worked perfectly; I noticed someone asked whether it changes with spring and fall time changes, and I don't know the answer to that. I guess we will know when the October change gets here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong, older version clock sent newer version box!
customer_reviews.text: I received a clock that was advertised as having a battery backup and nighttime dimming features. The box says it has this but the clock doesn’t. I looked online and saw there was an earlier version that had these features as optional. Why this one was boxed in what was probably for a newer one, I don’t know. My husband really likes the interface but unfortunately it’s not as advertised so was returned. Amazon was, as always, awesome in assisting me getting it returned.
customer_reviews.author: Noel M

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This had made an amazing difference in our lives. My family member would call me 5 times a day to ask what day it was or what the date was. Within 24 hours of setting this clock up for them no more calls. Helps my family member remain independent, relieves confusion and if unplugged you just plug it back in and its immediately set up for the date,day time etc. I would 5 star recommend this for anyone who needs it, especially loved ones with memory issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Page

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with "dimmable" feature
customer_reviews.text: The clock is OK, but expensive for what it is. I was very disappointed in the dimmable feature. You have no control over brightness (or dim) You have no control over the timing. Your choice is to dim it between 10 pm and 7 am or not. No other timing is achievable. You have no control over how dim to make it. In fact it is rather bright for something that is supposed to be dimmed. Clocks at half the price have more and better features and dimmers. I am keeping it only because it is very large print and tells day and date. I will have to find some film to dim it down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed but loved it when it worked
customer_reviews.text: We loved this clock and are hoping for a replacement from this company. One week after giving to my Mom, she walked in her room and the display was “ mirror reversed”. We still don’t understand what happened. Very disappointed but loved the product when it was working correctly. My Mom with early dementia walked in her room to see this......Update, this company has not responded to my message I left after talking with an Amazon representative, Jay. This clock worked for 2 weeks, DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY! I would rate zero stars if it let me

customer_reviews.title: My 89 year-old mother loves her clear clock. She ...

This time zone default means the clock does not automatically change time when daylight savings time begins and ends or when the clock loses power.

So far, I feel like this was a really good value. Hopefully it lasts :). Disliked: At this stage, nothing. I haven't set it up in my grandmother's nursing home room yet so I don't know what her reaction to it will be. However, I really like it!
